thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: S&N Massoud

author: S&N Massoud
title: S&N Massoud
text:
Absolutely fantastic service by Cameron.
Very patient and friendly over the phone. He went the extra mile to ensure we got the best possible result. And then gave a little extra by advising us of things to check and do to really improve our experience on board.
I was worried at first to book on-line due to so many scams (and I work in IT). But this proved to be a great experience, highly recommended. Will use them again !
